pullrequest.title: Issue#96 Add Thrust Angle and Rotation Joint

content.raw: This PR is nearly complete, but still needs joy teleop tested and improved. I have a GameCube and PS1 controller at home, but no way to connect it. I may have an Xbox controller around somewhere.
